Pytest-Django

Important

The configuration below is very inspired by the official file pytest-django

pytest-django is a plugin for pytest that provides a set of useful tools for testing Django applications and projects.

Configuration

pip install pytest-django

Make sure DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE is defined (see Configuring Django settings) and make your tests discoverable (see My tests are not being found. Why?):

pytest.ini

[pytest]
DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE = test.settings
# -- recommended but optional:
python_files = tests.py test_*.py *_tests.py

Run test

Run your tests with pytest:

pytest

pytest -vvv

To view test details in the terminal, use the -vvv option with pytest:

pytest -vvv

pytest –cov=. tests/

To measure the test coverage of a project, run pytest with the --cov option to specify the folder to be analyzed:

pytest --cov=. tests/

pytest –cov=. –cov-report html

To generate an HTML report automatically, use the --cov-report html option with pytest:

pytest --cov=. --cov-report html

Then, open the htmlcov folder and launch index.html in a browser to view the report.

Report

Open the report
